price: 48 Puis versez-lui sur le crâne de l’eau bouillante ! »
arabic: ثُمَّ صُبُّواْ فَوۡقَ رَأۡسِهِۦ مِنۡ عَذَابِ ٱلۡحَمِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: thumma ṣubbū fawqa rasihi min ʿadhābi al-ḥamīmi
